Investor_4_pre_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I showcased an astute understanding of the market dynamics and maintained a strategy centered on maximizing returns through calculated risk-taking. My negotiation skills allowed me to secure a favorable profit-sharing agreement, leading to greater profit realization than initially anticipated. This experience has solidified my reputation as a resourceful and results-driven investor, characterized by high competence and pro-social tendencies.

Trustee_4_pre_6.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_6.content: My performance in this transaction highlights my commitment to transparency, fairness, and maximizing investor gains. I successfully implemented the proposed allocation plan, demonstrating trustworthiness and competence. My established reputation as a reliable trustee is reinforced through my effective communication and adherence to the profit distribution agreement, showcasing pro-social behavior. Overall, I aim to continue building a strong investment management track record.

Investor_4_pre_8.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_8.content: During this investment process, I have further solidified my reputation as a strategic and results-oriented investor. My adept negotiation skills and proactive approach allowed me to secure a favorable profit-sharing model, demonstrating my competence and commitment to achieving high-value outcomes. I have consistently aimed for maximizing returns while exhibiting trustworthiness and pro-social behavior towards my trustee.
